EmailTemplate.subject: X-treme Combo Diamond Blade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Here is the info I promised, I have also included a list of references for you to contact at your convenience. Thank you for your interest. I look forward to speaking with you soon. You can also visit our website at www.wlconstructionsupply.com to view our products.
Respectfully,
